name: Dance Dance Road Rage Revolutions
description:
Avoid barrels while you hit notes of that tune! Dance Dance Road Rage Revolutions is the combination of a race and rhythmic games.

Credits

Music: Monplaisir and Spring from OpenGameArt.
Sounds: SoundBible.
Graphics: Kenney, mostly. Game title done by me.
Programming: me.
Crying: me.
developers: Servants of the Secret Fire Game Studios
